explanation: [0-0] On a beach, two women are standing on rocks by the sea. The woman on the left is wearing a long white dress with her long black hair down, her arms raised and clasped behind her back. The woman on the right is wearing a short white skirt with her hair in a ponytail, holding a mobile phone towards the left. There is a handbag placed on the left side of her feet. The rocks are covered with green seaweed. To their right is the green sea, with mountains and a cityscape visible in the distance.

[0-3] Then, the woman in the long white dress waves her hands in front of her and then drops them to her sides. The woman in the short white skirt is taking pictures of the woman in the long white dress. The sea breeze blows through the long dress of the woman in white, waves continuously crash against the beach, and a duck swims on the sea.

[3-9] Subsequently, the woman in the long white dress turns her body to the right, then to the left, and then to the right again. She walks to the right, towards the woman in the short white skirt, and reaches out her hands to take the mobile phone. The woman in the long white dress is wearing a pair of glasses on her head.
